item.description:
Our Viva Italia's own Marjolaine has been kind and generous to open the doors to her home for our Ferragosto Festa next Friday, August 14th.

The directions and her address will be made available only to those who RSVP'd Yes.

There is a limit of 20 that she can accomodate, so act quickly! Please RSVP through meetup and not through Marjolaine's email address. Please be sure you can make before you click YES.


Since this is a potluck dinner we ask that you each bring an item of listed below if you are planning to attend. Here are some suggestions:

What To Bring:
-beverage of your choice (alcoholic or non) - this does not count as the potluck item
-pot luck food item or plates, utensils, etc (to be coordinated amongst participants, by emailing Marjolaine at email: nuneslaine@gmail.com as she will keep a list of what everyone is bringing to avoid doubling up on things)

Keep posted to Viva Italia's Meetup page for more information!

Ciao
Lorenzo
